title: Reincarnated as a Warlord in a Sengoku Era - Novel Updates
tags: Alternate World   Ancient Times   Aristocracy   Character Growth   Clever Protagonist   Depictions of Cruelty   Different Social Status   Male Protagonist   Military   Modern Knowledge   Nobles   Polygamy   Reincarnation   Royalty   Samurai   Schemes And Conspiracies   Special Abilities   Strategic Battles   Strategist   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Wars   Weak to Strong
author: Ohauchi Karasu   尾羽内 鴉
description:
When the man opened his eyes, he was reincarnated as the heir of a famous clan in the Sengoku Era.

Unfortunately, the 'famous clan' he was reincarnated into is different from the famous clan in his expectation. What is waiting for him in the future is death.

As such while facing the harsh reality the man struggled, all in order to change his future.

This is a tale of a young man rising in the harsh Sengoku era using the art of war.>
